resources.string: Rotten Fridge is an app that allows to manage your fridge in a virtual way. \n\nYou insert the products with their expiration date and quantity, then the app will show them to you!
If you want to add a product, \njust click on this button!
Insert the "Product Name" in the singular form!
Complete all the fields and click ADD

Now you can see all the products in your fridge!

 If you want more details about a product, 
 just click on it!

Now you can see all the details about the product!

If you want to update or delete it, 
use these buttons!
